item.title: French Learn Tips
item.description: Standards: Just focus on the words what we use most in chatting: Compared with our own language, habit, culture, self-introduce Be postive to talk with native speakers: Language is used to let other undersand us 200 words Conjonction Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning Words Meaning et and aussi also autre other même same ou or mais but peut-être maybe si if alors so,then d’abord first ensuite then donc therefore moi aussi me too pas moi not me Words Meaning Example Words Meaning Example être to be Êtes-vous marié?
